Title: Bryce and Chloe
Writer: Marissa Jo Cerar, Thomas Higgins, Brian Yorkey (created for television by), Jay Asher (based upon the book by)
Actors: Dylan Minnette, Katherine Langford, Christian Navarro, Alisha Boe
Plot: Chaos erupts at school in the aftermath of Bryce's testimony. Jessica tells Chloe about the clubhouse. Alex's memories come rushing back.
